item.description:
This summers fashions are filled with lots of color and striking contrasts of bold and neutral. This meetup photo event will reflect this season's statement.

A photo session combining elements of neutral hues with a pop of color.

We will have 3 models (2 female/1 male) at this session. Each model will be dressed in an attire reflective of the theme.

This is a great opportunity for those who are looking to add to their portfolio.

Models, makeup artist, hair stylist, nail artist, photographers and fashion stylist who want to be a part of this event should RSVP.

Photographers you have the opportunity to shoot for 2 or 4 hours.

The location is accessible whether you drive or take the T. Not far from the Southeast express way. I will provide detailed directions and post separately.

To all that RSVP, please be sure you have your kit and/gear ready for this event. This is a working photo-shoot meet up session.

Â
item.how_to_find_us: This location is accesible by car or T

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: Neon & Neutral - Pops of color with neutral contrasting statements- photo shoot
